title: Spring comes to Kashmir
creator_credit: Ravi Prakash, Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: A panorama of spring in the mountains of Kashmir. The melting snows and running streams; the herders taking their beasts up to pastures; work beginning in the fields; smartening up the river boats for tourists; the gardens and orchards.
creator_credit_for_label: Ravi Prakash, Jehangir Bhownagary and Documentary Films of India
